exceptions.exn: The LHS of Derive_n_comp (Derive_n (Derive_n _ _) _ _) does not match any subterm of the goal
The LHS of Derive_n_scal_r (Derive_n (fun y : R => _ y * _) _ _) does not match any subterm of the goal
The LHS of pow_add (_ ^ (_ + _)) does not match any subterm of the goal

In environment H4 : forall (f : R -> R) (n m : nat) (x : R), Derive_n (Derive_n f m) n x = Derive_n f (n + m) x H3 : forall (x : R) (n m : nat), x ^ (n + m) = x ^ n * x ^ m H0 : forall (f : R -> R) (n : nat) (a x : R), Derive_n (fun y : R => f y * a) n x = Derive_n f n x * a f : R -> R a : R n : nat x : R x0 : posreal H1 : forall y : R, ball (a * x) x0 y -> forall k : nat, (k <= n)%nat -> ex_derive_n f k y Unable to unify "a ^ n * Derive_n f n (a * x)" with "Derive_n (fun y : R => f (a * y)) n x".

original: intros. rewrite Derive_n_comp. rewrite Derive_n_scal_r. rewrite pow_add. reflexivity.
